name: Princess Pyro
description:
Note from developer:

Hey friends! If yall end up loving Princess Pyro, I could certainly see a more elaborate continuation or derivative in the future. Thank you SO much for your support. Please enjoy and have fun <3


Princess Pyro's searing fire powers are the only hope to revert the mysteriously sudden nightfall and fight back the encroaching forces of darkness!

THE GAME

A short and sweet nod to retro arcade gaming, with some roguelike difficulty, and metroidvania flourishes! Unleash fiery havoc across Pyro Castle to uncover the source of the sudden nightfall! Fight your way to the end and defeat the source of darkness... Dun dun dunnnnn. Rack up points to get on the score board.

THE MAKING

Princess Pyro was made with a lot of soul and aimed for that flashy arcade style with roguelike difficulty.

CREDITS

Creative commons music by Sound Forces. A bit of inspiration from games like Rogue Legacy and Metroid Dread.

EXTRAS & NOTES


  • Xinput controllers supported.
  • Three difficulty modes.
  • Female protagonist.
  • Locally saved hi-scores (like an old arcade box).
  • Secret spots and optional precision-jumps.
  • An in-hiding Ms Goblets.


Please enjoy and have fun <3
